lyrics:
4 contributorsgreener pastures lyricsverse 1
wish i could say it was gonna get better
but we oughta know better by now
im gonna pack my shit into a cardboard box
and get the hell outta this house
gonna roll one for the road
hit more than that county line
this whole world has gone to pot
and right now so am i

chorus
im movin on to greener pastures
gettin stoned so it dont matter
i tried prayin to the man up high
i tried drinkin til the well ran dry
im movin on to greener pastures
yes i am

verse 2
i dont know what took so long
to say solong to you
all you do is wear me out
just like the evening news
so you can plant your garden
where you used to chew my ass
yeah i dont want this dirt no more
im tradin it for grass
see brothers osborne liveget tickets as low as 55you might also likechorus
im movin on to greener pastures
gettin stoned so it dont matter
i tried prayin to the man up high
i tried drinkin til the well ran dry
im movin on to greener pastures

bridge
roll it up light it up take a little toke
hit it til it all goes up in smoke up in smoke
puff puff pass it around back to myself right now

chorus
im movin on to greener pastures
gettin stoned so it dont matter
i tried prayin to the man up high
i tried drinkin til the well ran dry
im movin on to greener pastures
i tried prayin to the man up high
i tried drinkin til the well ran dry
im movin on to greener pasturesembed
